attributes.review: I downloaded this app by mistake. But i figured i’d check it out anyways since it was already on my phone. The second i opened the app, it got ugly. I kept crashing on me for 15 minutes straight. Finally when i got it to work, there was a bunch of message notifications that were waiting for me. When i opened it up, it was direct messages to me .. from Donald Trunk. He was sending selfies to me and calling my mom fat!!! He said she could easily land the role of the bus that hits Regina George if Mean Girls did another remake. When i asked him to stop, he kept saying her lasagna recipe sucked and she had ugly ankles. I didn’t know what to do so i quickly closed the app and deleted it. PLEASE do not download this app or mess around with this demonic technology. He will call your mom fat and criticize her oddly shaped ankles!!!!!
attributes.title: This app called my mom fat.

attributes.review: Instructions weren’t clear, my dog is now my toaster. And my sister is in Colorado. What do I do?
